mapper.update:
UPDATE `tb_product` SET
`product_no` = #{set.productNo},
`product_cate` = #{set.productCate},
`product_name` = #{set.productName},
`product_cate_name` = #{set.productCateName},
`product_tag` = #{set.productTag},
`principal` = #{set.principal},
`sketch` = #{set.sketch},
`hotline` = #{set.hotline},
`notmobile` = #{set.notmobile},
`operate` = #{set.operate},
`images` = #{set.images},
`views` = #{set.views},
`comments` = #{set.comments},
`buyfew` = #{set.buyfew},
`commission_ratio` = #{set.commissionRatio},
`addtime` = #{set.addtime},
`isshow` = #{set.isshow},
`isdel` = #{set.isdel},
`price` = #{set.price},
`security` = #{set.security},
`trip` = #{set.trip},
`origin` = #{set.origin},
`destination` = #{set.destination},
`content` = #{set.content},
`product_id` in
#{item} and
`product_id` >= #{where.productIdSt} and
`product_id` <= #{where.productIdEd} and
`product_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_cate` in
#{item} and
`product_cate` >= #{where.productCateSt} and
`product_cate` <= #{where.productCateEd} and
`product_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_cate_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_cate_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_cate_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_tag` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_tag` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_tag` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`principal` in
#{item} and
(
`Principal` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Principal` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sketch` in
#{item} and
(
`Sketch` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sketch` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`hotline` in
#{item} and
(
`Hotline` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Hotline` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`notmobile` in
#{item} and
`notmobile` >= #{where.notmobileSt} and
`notmobile` <= #{where.notmobileEd} and
`operate` in
#{item} and
(
`Operate` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Operate` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`images` in
#{item} and
(
`Images` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Images` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`views` in
#{item} and
`views` >= #{where.viewsSt} and
`views` <= #{where.viewsEd} and
`comments` in
#{item} and
`comments` >= #{where.commentsSt} and
`comments` <= #{where.commentsEd} and
`buyfew` in
#{item} and
`buyfew` >= #{where.buyfewSt} and
`buyfew` <= #{where.buyfewEd} and
`commission_ratio` in
#{item} and
`commission_ratio` >= #{where.commissionRatioSt} and
`commission_ratio` <= #{where.commissionRatioEd} and
`addtime` in
#{item} and
`addtime` >= #{where.addtimeSt} and
`addtime` <= #{where.addtimeEd} and
`isshow` in
#{item} and
`isshow` >= #{where.isshowSt} and
`isshow` <= #{where.isshowEd} and
`isdel` in
#{item} and
`isdel` >= #{where.isdelSt} and
`isdel` <= #{where.isdelEd} and
`price` in
#{item} and
(
`Price` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Price` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`security` in
#{item} and
(
`Security` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(

) and

) and
